issue.message: The color "switcher_color" in values-night has no declaration in the base `values` folder; this can lead to crashes when the resource is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier

The color "switcher_color_track_tint" in values-night has no declaration in the base `values` folder; this can lead to crashes when the resource is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier
